title: Anatomy & Structure
tip: Note the consistent structure in hands, face, and proportions.

captions.ai: La Comtesse de Belamy, created by OBVIOUS

hotspots.label: Misaligned eyes
hotspots.explanation: AI-generated eyes appear asymmetrical or misaligned, especially when the face is turned.

hotspots.label: Melting hands
hotspots.explanation: AI struggles with hand anatomy. See the distorted fingers and inconsistent shading.

hotspots.label: Melting limbs
hotspots.explanation: AI-generated limbs may appear warped, blurred, or inconsistently attached to the body, breaking anatomical logic.

title: Lighting & Shadows
tip: Do the shadows make sense based on the light source?

captions.ai: AI generated shadow duality, digital art illustration, Generative AI Pro Photo

hotspots.label: Inconsistent shadow direction
hotspots.explanation: AI sometimes generates lighting where shadows fall in multiple directions, defying consistent light source logic.

title: Textures & Surfaces
tip: Watch for overly smooth or plastic-like textures.

captions.ai: Washing in New Pastorals Series by David Salle
captions.real: Bouquet of Flowers in an Urn by Jan van Huysum

hotspots.label: Plastic-like skin
hotspots.explanation: AI-generated skin and backgrounds often appear overly smooth or plastic-like, lacking realistic surface texture or detail.

title: Symmetry & Composition
tip: Perfect symmetry may be a red flag.

hotspots.label: Cloned Symmetry
hotspots.explanation: The left and right halves of the face are near-perfect mirror images. Such mathematical symmetry is uncommon in human-drawn or photographed subjects and can be a sign of AI generation.

title: Symbolism & Intent
tip: AI models sometimes conflate styles across eras

captions.ai: AI image generated by ChatGPT - Prompt : 'Knight in a mystic garden'

hotspots.label: Chronological Inconsistency
hotspots.explanation: The central figure, depicted as a medieval knight, is wearing Art-Deco-style earrings — a fashion trend from the 1920s–30s.

hotspots.label: Incoherent Cultural Symbolism
hotspots.explanation: The decorative border mixes Celtic knots with Japanese kanji characters that appear nonsensical or mistranslated.
